Submit






Submit 

Watershed Review takes submissions in the spring (January 15th through March 15th) and fall (August 1st through September 30th). We welcome submissions of poetry, fiction, creative nonfiction, and art.
We encourage you to read the current issue and archives: www.watershedreview.com
No previously published works are accepted. Simultaneous submissions are permitted, but please alert Watershed Review to a piece’s potential publication elsewhere. Watershed Review acquires one-time rights. All rights subsequently revert to author.
Submit here: https://watershedreview.submittable.com/submit
